statements: UPDATE medication_adherence SET dosage_mg = 200, adherence_percentage = 95.50 WHERE patient_id = 1234 AND medication_name = 'Aspirin';

UPDATE medication_adherence SET adherence_percentage = 95.50, dosage_mg = 500 WHERE patient_id = 123 AND medication_name = 'Aspirin';
UPDATE medication_adherence SET recorded_date = '2022-10-15', dosage_mg = 750 WHERE medication_name = 'Ibuprofen' AND patient_id = 456;
